itunes:title: John Week 4 with Vaneetha Rendall Risner
title: John Week 4 with Vaneetha Rendall Risner
description:
Join us for the fourth week of the Gospel of John as Amanda welcomes author Vaneetha Risner to the podcast. Together, they read and discuss several passages of Scripture that have been transformative in Vaneetha’s own testimony. What does it look like to confess Jesus as Savior in our words and actions? Do people see the gospel in our lives through our love? What are Vaneetha’s three go-to prepositions in times of suffering? Throughout the episode, they unpack these questions and more as they are reminded through Scripture of our greatest hope and only true comfort in the sorrow and suffering of this world.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 4 of the She Reads Truth John reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the John collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/john-week-4-with-vaneetha-rendall-risner
